DOC.brief_summary: This follow-up study open label , single-center , phase I clinical trial evaluate safety Pneumostem® premature infant Intraventricular hemorrhage .
DOC.brief_title: Follow-Up Study Safety Efficacy Pneumostem® Premature Infants With Intraventricular Hemorrhage
DOC.criteria: Patients enrol previous phase 1 clinical trial Pneumostem transplantation IVH . Patients enrol previous phase 1 clinical trial Pneumostem transplantation IVH .
